title: Ssrf in Example Corp
description: Discovered Server-Side Request Forgery via URL params affecting Example Corp. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to make requests to internal systems and potentially access sensitive data.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
